2: Communication service reliability: mean time between failures
4: Service bit rate: user experienced data rate

3:
Accuracy fee control: < 100 (note 1);
General information data collection: < 3000

0:
NOTE 1: 	One-way delay from 5G IoT device to backend system. The distance between the two is below 40 km (city range).
NOTE 2: 	It is the typical connection density in today city environment. With the evolution from centralised meters to socket meters in the home, the connection density is expected to increase 5 to 10 times.
